questions.prompt: A 60 degree shear wave is used to inspect a 100mm diameter steel bar in a circumferential direction. An indication is located from a point defect at a beam path of 40mm. What is the depth of this defect below the bar surface [Cosine rule a2=b2+c 2 -2 bc cos A] ?
